paragraphs.text:
%md
# Load CSV Data

This code loads the `nyc-jobs.csv` file that will be used as the primary data source.

msg.data:
Load CSV Data

This code loads the nyc-jobs.csv file that will be used as the primary data source.

paragraphs.text:
val data = spark.read
    .format("csv")
    .option("header", "true")
    .load("/data/nyc-jobs.csv")

msg.data: data: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [Job ID: string, Agency: string ... 26 more fields]

val displayBusinessTitles = businessTitles
    .map(row=>(
            row(0).toString,
            row(0).toString
                .toLowerCase
                .split(" ")
                .map(_.capitalize)
                .mkString(" ")
        ))
    .toDF("Business Title", "Display Title")

z.show(displayBusinessTitles)

    .distinct()
    .orderBy("Display Title")

## Count Job Postings
Do a simple query that shows the number of `Job Postings` per `Level`.

msg.data:
Count Job Postings

Do a simple query that shows the number of Job Postings per Level.

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql

SELECT Level, COUNT(*) AS `Job Postings`
FROM nycData
WHERE `Salary Frequency` = "Annual"
GROUP BY Level
ORDER BY Level

%spark.sql

SELECT Level, AVG(`Salary Range To`) AS `Average Max Salary`
FROM nycData
WHERE `Salary Frequency` = "Annual"
GROUP BY Level
ORDER BY Level

%md
## Top 10 Business Titles
Get a list of the top 10 Business Titles

msg.data:
Top 10 Business Titles

Get a list of the top 10 Business Titles

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql
SELECT
    bt.`Display Title`,
    COUNT(*) AS Total
    
FROM nycData jb
    LEFT OUTER JOIN businessTitles bt
        ON jb.`Business Title` = bt.`Business Title`

GROUP BY
    bt.`Display Title`
    
ORDER BY
    Total DESC
    
LIMIT
    10

%md
## Annual Salary Distribution

msg.data: Annual Salary Distribution

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql
SELECT 
    (`Salary Range From` + `Salary Range To`) / 2 AS Salary,
    COUNT(1) AS Value
    
FROM
   nycData 
    
WHERE 
    `Salary Frequency` = "Annual"
    
GROUP BY
    Salary
    
ORDER BY
    Salary ASC
